changelog: Added Ocean Spider House and Beneath the Well maps
Removed Clock Town Stray Fairy visibility rule
Added the last few remaining icons for locations
Attempted fix for erronous Moon access
Added items only and maps only variants
Twin Islands spring chests now requires Zora Mask
Tour Guide pictures have new descriptions to tell the player which pictures are valid
Bombchu capacities changed to 20, 30, and 40
Added new icons to display next to location names
Moved grotto next to Secret Shrine and Ikana scrub elsewhere
Removed total bottle count
Empty bottles will properly update once one is obtained
Fixed Stone Tower Map Purchase showing unavailable despite having access to Tingle in Great Bay Coast
Gossip Stones hints will now show in all four spots
Fixed some locations' hints that would remain blue despite being checked
Various logic changes/fixes
Removed visibility rules for Tingle locations
Fixed Damage Multiplier option not updating on server connection
Disabled Goron Village Deku Trade Freestanding HP (Spring)
Fixed late STT rooms showing green despite not having light arrows or mirror shield
Fixed some chest in GBT that were synchronized
Curiosity Shop rupee trades are now only visible when shopsanity is set to advanced
Logic fixes
Added locations for mountain, Great Bay and Ikana regions
New and updated maps
UI overhaul
New options in pack settings, which update automatically on server connection
